column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/159bc4819304c4394a92230c9e7b9f3416abe877 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

mapOrphanTransactions[hash] cannot be null; it will be initialized to an empty (default constructor) CTransaction when referenced. That should be impossible, because addOrphan/EraseOrphan keeps mapOrphanTransactions and mapOrphanTransactionsByPrev in sync. But even if some bug caused it to happen, if that default CTransaction made it out of the orphan list it would be rejected by the memory pool.
Haven't tested, but looks good to me.\n
